title: Traits and Features
content: rcane magic into your next shot, turning it into a potent threat to your enemies. Arcane Archer Lvl 3 Twinkling Constellations Feature Your Starry Forms are improved. The Archer's damage and the Chalice's healing are each increased by 1d8, and the Dragon gains the ability to hover and Fly at a movement speed of 6 m / 20 ft.
